There are two ways, the easiest way is to go to www.oildirectory.com and click on "add a new listing". This will open a form that you can fill out, once your company is listed on www.oildirectory.com it will automatically be listed in all future electronic phone directories. The second way is to contact us directly.

____________________________________

Can I make copies of this directory for my employees or customers?

Yes you may, this directory is public domain, make as many copies as you like for your employees, friends or clients. We can add a copy of your basic website to the directory so you can use it as a corporate give-away.

____________________________________

How often is the electronic phone directory updated?

The website www.oildirectory.com is a dynamic page that is being updated constantly. The Electronic Directory is updated weekly.

How do I find a company?

There are two ways:
1: Just scroll down through the list until you find the company you are looking for.
2: Click on the category of company in the Table of Contents and you will be directed to the companies listed in that category.
___________________________________

How do I find a local company?

All listings are listed under category first, next by location, then alphabetically.

___________________________________

My company isn't listed in the directory, how do I get it included?
